questions.question: What is meant by a life cycle?

options.text: Stages of life of a living being

questions.answer: Stages of life of a living being

questions.question: Which stage comes first in the life cycle of a butterfly?
What is the larva of a butterfly called?
Which stage comes after larva in insects?
Which animal gives birth to young ones?
Which animal lays eggs?
What is the young one of a frog called?
Which stage is a resting stage in insects?
Which animal shows complete metamorphosis?
What do we call change in form during life cycle?
Which stage involves rapid growth?
Which animal has tadpole stage?
Which is the correct order of butterfly life cycle?
Which animal baby looks similar to adult?
Which animal lays eggs in water?
What is the adult stage of a frog called?
Which animals feed milk to babies?
What comes after the adult stage?
Which stage prepares insect for adulthood?
Which animal does not lay eggs?
Which stage comes last in life cycle?
Which animal life cycle has four stages?
What do baby animals need most?
Which animal baby is called chick?
Which stage shows maximum change in insects?
Which animal grows inside mother?
Which animal has direct development?
What helps animals grow?
Which animal baby is called calf?
Which animal shows indirect development?
Which stage comes after egg in frog?
Why do animals reproduce?
Which animal lays many eggs?
What is the purpose of pupa stage?
Which animal starts life as egg?
Which animal has similar looking baby?
Which stage involves eating a lot?
Which animal life cycle is fastest?
Which animal baby is called puppy?
Which stage is common in all animals?
Which animal lives on land and water?
Which animal shows incomplete change?
Which stage involves laying eggs?
Which animal feeds milk to young ones?
What do animals need at all stages?
Which animal baby is called cub?
Which animal does not have larva stage?
What do adult animals do?
What is the life cycle of animals?
questions.answer: It is the series of stages an animal passes through from birth to death.

questions.question: Why do animals have a life cycle?
questions.answer: Life cycle helps animals grow, reproduce, and continue their species.

questions.question: What is an egg stage?
questions.answer: It is the first stage where a young animal develops inside an egg.

questions.question: What is a larva stage?
questions.answer: It is the stage after egg when the animal eats and grows quickly.

questions.question: Why is larva stage important?
questions.answer: It helps the animal gain energy and grow in size.

questions.question: What happens in the pupa stage?
questions.answer: The animal rests and changes into an adult form.

questions.question: Why is pupa called a resting stage?
questions.answer: Because the insect does not eat or move much during this stage.

questions.question: What is an adult stage?
questions.answer: It is the fully grown stage of an animal.

questions.question: What is metamorphosis?
questions.answer: It is the complete change in body form during the life cycle.

questions.question: Which animals show metamorphosis?
What is a tadpole?
questions.answer: It is the young stage of a frog that lives in water.

questions.question: Why do frogs lay eggs in water?
questions.answer: So that tadpoles can live and grow in water.

questions.question: How is a frog life cycle different from a cow?
questions.answer: Frogs change form while cows look similar to their babies.

questions.question: What is direct development?
questions.answer: It is when babies look similar to adults.

questions.question: What is indirect development?
questions.answer: It is when babies look different from adults.

questions.question: Name one animal with direct development.
Name one animal with indirect development.
Why do animals need food at every stage?
questions.answer: Food provides energy for growth and survival.

questions.question: What do baby animals need?
questions.answer: They need food, care, and protection.

questions.question: Why is care important for young animals?
questions.answer: Care keeps them safe from danger.

questions.question: What is reproduction?
questions.answer: It is the process by which animals produce young ones.

questions.question: Why is reproduction important?
Which stage helps insects prepare for adulthood?
questions.answer: Pupa stage prepares insects for adulthood.

questions.question: What is the last stage of life cycle?
questions.answer: Death is the last stage of life cycle.

questions.question: Do all animals have the same life cycle?
questions.answer: No, different animals have different life cycles.

questions.question: Why do insects lay many eggs?
questions.answer: To ensure survival of some young ones.

questions.question: What do mammals feed their babies?
questions.answer: They feed milk to their babies.

questions.question: Why do animals grow?
questions.answer: Animals grow to become adults and reproduce.

questions.question: What happens after animals become adults?
Why is the life cycle important?
questions.answer: It helps living beings continue life on earth.

questions.question: What is growth?
questions.answer: Growth is increase in size and strength.

questions.question: What helps animals survive?
questions.answer: Food, water, air, and shelter help animals survive.

questions.question: Why do baby animals need protection?
Which animals lay eggs?
questions.answer: Birds, insects, and fish lay eggs.

questions.question: Which animals give birth?
questions.answer: Mammals give birth to young ones.

questions.question: How do insects change form?
Why is larva stage active?
questions.answer: Because the animal eats and grows a lot.

questions.question: What happens if animals do not reproduce?
Which stage comes after egg in insects?
What stage comes after tadpole?
Why is water important in frog life cycle?
questions.answer: Frog eggs and tadpoles need water.

questions.question: What is a chick?
questions.answer: A chick is a baby hen.

questions.question: What is a calf?
questions.answer: A calf is a baby cow.

questions.question: How do animals help nature?
Why should we care for animals?
questions.answer: Animals are living beings and part of nature.

questions.question: What do adult animals do for babies?
questions.answer: They protect and feed their babies.

questions.question: Which animals have long life cycles?
questions.answer: Animals like elephants have long life cycles.

questions.question: How does learning life cycles help us?
questions.answer: It helps us understand animals better.

questions.question: What is survival?
Why is environment important for life cycle?
